price: Isaan Gooftaa isaaniitti kafaraniif adabbii jahannamtu jira. Deebi’ichi waa fokkate!
arabic: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِرَبِّهِمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walilladhīna kafarū birabbihim ʿadhābu jahannama wabi'sa al-maṣīru
